website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for gifting, this adorable cookbook stand features a chic design and heavy-duty metal.
pros: Wrought iron build makes the stand remarkably sturdy and durable
Stand is big enough to hold larger cookbooks
Particularly lightweight despite the metal frame
Contemporary design looks great in almost any kitchen
cons: Some customers had issues with shipping
May be too big for some kitchen counters

customer_reviews.title: Winner in form and function!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Just the right weight and size to hold a cookbook and super pretty! The angle of the lean back is perfect and I especially like the ball and chain feature for holding down the pages. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and functional! It's pretty big, so make sure you have space. I've got a fairly large cookbook in it, and it holds beautifully. It has a vintage look, which I love. There are a couple of manufacturing flaws, but I think it adds character to the piece, making it appear even more vintage; one of a kind. My favorite things about it are the little balls on chains that flip over and hold the pages in place. Even my husband commented on it, and trust me, that is huge! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sherylanne

customer_reviews.title: Rust Everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and saw rust everywhere. I was so excited to receive this item as I've been looking for a cookbook stand for quite a while. The design and color were perfect. As I looked closer, it turns out the entire stand is rusted and the bag has a lot of rust inside. I didn't even bother opening up the bag. I would not want this sitting on my kitchen counter and damaging my cookbooks. I'm returning it asap.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great  Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom, a major cook, and she loves it! She tells me that besides being attractive looking, it is strong enough to hold a large, hard-covered cookbook (the weights do a good job), yet you could easily place a single recipe sheet on it's shelf-- and better yet, secure it with a simple refrigerator magnet. The color and design work well with all kitchens styles; the positive feedback helped me make this decision to buy, so I thought I'd add to the list by saying I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kchiggs

customer_reviews.title: Very good book stand
customer_reviews.text: Holds books securely, and has weighted chains to keep the pages flat. It is quite large and does a great job with large cookbooks. The stand folds flat against the back but don't expect the entire thing to be easy to put away, even folded it is still 3 inches thick. I hang it on the wall when it isn't being used. Although it is very sturdy and decorative, the metalwork and welding is more crafty than professional but the imperfections add to its charm.
customer_reviews.author: F. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I do not like about this cookbook stand. It is attractive and looks a lot more expensive then it actually cost. It is sturdy and holds my cookbooks at a great angle to be read while preparing recipes. It also works well for my IPad when I am using my Kindle cookbooks. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Terrible paint/polish job
customer_reviews.text: The color doesn't match the pictures. And the paint/polishing job is terrible. It is not smooth. Seems like it is rusty. The packaging it came in was all rusty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Usmania Hamid

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful way to display and use your cookbooks
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It keeps even the tightest bound book open to the correct page. There are weighted chains at the top to hold the top of the pages down but do not cover up the words. The stand is very durable and somewhat heavy so it will not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: jkesmom2

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not metal
customer_reviews.text: The description said this was a metal cookbook stand. The one I received was plastic. I immediately put it back in the box to return. I have many hard-cover cookbooks and need a metal stand that will hold them; this was not what I'm looking for. I gave two stars because the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for - a sturdy book holder that is good looking and still works to hold large recipe books open. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodhouse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This stand can hold up a hard cover cookbook with no problems. Takes up a bit of counter space, but if you're looking for a stand it's this one!
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook stand is really beautiful and quite sturdy. My only problem is that the decorative bottom portion of the book holder covers up some of the recipe - so I am having to move the page up and down to read all of the recipe. Otherwise, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: pianos41

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. It is a lovely brown bronze color and matches my decor beautifully! It is sturdy and can fit a vast array of books!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, not as heavy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cookbook stand. Well built, not nearly as heavy as I thought it would be. It's sturdy and wide enough to hold even my old lofty tome of Joy of Cooking, so long as the recipe I need is located in the middle 1/3 of the book. Accommodates all of my other books nicely. It does fold down for easy storage. This would be an excellent gift for anyone who enjoys cooking or even for those who don't but must. I'm thrilled with this purchase and would buy it again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: NeedleSorePaws

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great quality am so happy with it. Would definitely gift this item perhaps along with a cookbook to someone and am sure they'd be more than pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I like this stand, especially for the price. My only concern is that the bottom part of the stand that holds the book in place slightly blocks the bottom part of recipes and you also can't flip the page without completely removing the book from the stand if the recipe continues on the next page of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.WD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This recipe book stand is beautiful! It is sturdy and looks so pretty on my counter. I have gotten many compliments on it and it has kept me from ruining any more cook books! It holds my large cookbooks perfectly, but it does take up a lot of counter space in order to be able to accommodate those larger books. It arrived quickly and would make a lovely gift. Others I reviewed before purchasing has complaints about flimsiness and pieces breaking off. Not this product. Feel confident in purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: K. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed, especially after all the great reviews. This thing was bent in several places. It is made from a cheap and flimsy material. It barely stood up. I realize the price was pretty good, but this thing looks like it came from the dollar store!
customer_reviews.author: T D S

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and was so impressed I bought two more for Ancestry Albums I had created for my Children. It has a very elegant look and I feel is of superb quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: Durable Cookbook Stand
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering this product simply because of all the reviews stating that it came broken or rusty.... but it came in absolutely perfect condition! I’m very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend this for those looking to buy a stylish and cost friendly cookbook stand.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Wrought iron black stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice wrought iron black book rack it has page holders back of stand folds for flat storage
customer_reviews.author: NZB

customer_reviews.title: Even Better In Person!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook stand even more than I thought I would when I ordered it! It is just perfect, and it arrived packaged very well and in a very timely manner. I am extremely pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rushfan

customer_reviews.title: Made for small books
customer_reviews.text: It seems this stand is made for very small cook books. The lip in the front only lets me use my thinner books. Other than that, it's very cute, but shakes a little because the legs aren't even.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This is so adorable! Got it for my sister for Christmas and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable! Got it for my sister for Christmas and she loves it. Makes it easy to read while cooking. It doesn’t take up that much room too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashro

customer_reviews.title: Really well made.
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and accommodating to the biggest book. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy flimsy metal Leg bent in shipping so I just bent it back slightly into place and then it fell completely off Right after I opened the box!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stand
customer_reviews.text: Use this item to hold a large photo canvas. Purchased a second as a gift for daughter in law to hold cookbook or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Steady buyer

customer_reviews.title: Akahina
customer_reviews.text: I love it and was perfect for my kitchen area Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Book Holder for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece! Item has a minor defect on one of the legs, but it is still an awesome addition for the price! Looks great on our counter!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Tan.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment of a product I thought I would like
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking stand but something I cannot keep in my small kitchen. It is just too big, period. Yes, it is sturdy, but it feels like a "tank" to me. It was hard to figure out just how heavy this was from the picture online. I am not sure I will keep it. It may end up in a garage sale, as a gift, or to the Goodwill. I am really disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette R. Liska

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bookstand
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very sturdy and attractive book stand. Holds cookbooks of all thicknesses! the weights work well in holding the pages down without being obstructive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful but like much of the other reviews it came ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but like much of the other reviews it came damages. One of the brackets in the back were broken so now it cannot stand. I found one a little more expensive from target and not broke . Save yourself the money and trust the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lamas

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this online (Even ordered it on back order and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this online (Even ordered it on back order and waited for it to come in). However, when it arrived I had to return it; As I have children and it was a safety hazard (Had multiple sharp metal spots & edges).
customer_reviews.author: bmh922

customer_reviews.title: Use this often, a little light weight for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this often, a little light weight for the heavy cookbooks that I use. Feels a bit unsteady at times.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook stand looked so cute and I couldn’t wait to give it as a gift. I am extremely disappointed because it is totally crooked, and does not sit on the countertop evenly. The left side is way longer than the right side, and it looks HORRIBLE. Will not be able to gift this, and am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah D.

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice. The design looks great in my old-world rustic ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice. The design looks great in my old-world rustic décor. And of course it's handy to have your cookbook held open to the page you're using. Functional, and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Auntkay53

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes to bake and we wanted a decorative cookbook stand. This is beautiful and works great at holding even large cookbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Bushidomonk

customer_reviews.title: Not for small kitchens
customer_reviews.text: It is way too big and bulky and also way overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookbook Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is both useful and beautiful! It looks great sitting on my kitchen counter, whether or not I have a cookbook in it. It is able to support large cookbooks, which is so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rohrs

customer_reviews.title: A must have for people who love to cook
customer_reviews.text: All around a great product. Wish it came in other colors but it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: bt451

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's cookbooks. She uses it in the kitchen and loves it. It's pretty sturdy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Shaddy Bowling

customer_reviews.title: should have bought one with plastic cover
customer_reviews.text: I chose this one because it looks nicer and seems much more durable than the type with the see-through cover. While this one looks very nice and holds the cookbook open, the bars on the bottom go over the cookbook and block some of the writing. A plastic holder doesn't have that problem. Also, the angle of this holder is not quite enough so I have to stoop a little to see it well. Wish the angle was a bit wider so the book would lay a little flatter. I guess it's okay for really, really short people! And I'm only 5'5".
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! It was just what I needed to display my daughter’s senior year picture book.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Walsh

customer_reviews.title: I love this bookstand - It definitely helps in keeping my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookstand - It definitely helps in keeping my books clean during cooking. No more oil or sugar all over the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Chauxes

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing I've purchased in awhile (and I buy all the time) beautiful in my kitchen. Very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, just what she was looking for, looks great, and makes it so easy to see her cook book while cooking, keeping it on the right page.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Roy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Use this to hold books while typing and doing homework! Perfect choice and looks quite nice on my desk. Very fashionable and useful.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty cookbook stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new stand! It's very pretty and is of great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rose

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stand!! It hold my books perfectly and just as I need to read them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give me a place to put my recipe book while cooking. It's very light weight and it does hold my recipe book. I keep in out on display. I am going to have to say that the book holder has the bar that comes out in front of the book and blocks some of the writing but I usually do not read the recipe word for word so this does not bother me. There are some weights to keep the pages from moving. They move easily and so it's not a issue. I really like this book holder. I would buy it again if I had need for another. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McMillion

customer_reviews.title: Functional & Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is even more substantial and beautiful in person. I'm thrilled with this purchase, especially at this price!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom who cares

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This is so practical and so beautiful on my counter. I really like the weighted chains for holding the pages down, too. Very well made, just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of this! It's nice and heavy and the chains with the balls on them do a great job of helping keep the pages flat. The back support folds up so that it can be easily stored. The bottom holding rack does sort of get in the way of recipies, but not enough to make a difference. The color and quality are great. Plan on buying one as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Really happy i bought this! Looks cute in my kitchen and holds my cookbooks perfectly..the ball and chain keeps the pages flat. Love !
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIE

customer_reviews.title: I love this and use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it all the time. Does not fall over and very decorative. I would recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Hardock

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just want I was looking for. It is true that the front piece can cover up some of the text, but it holds the book in place well. I'm pleased and would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Swift

customer_reviews.title: beautiful product and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: love how it looks with my colorful cookbooks displayed - also use it with my ipad. sturdy - form and function - love it
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gates

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, I chose this one to put the family ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I chose this one to put the family bible on because it had a space on the bottom to place the catechism book as well.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Sun

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a beautiful addition to my countertop. I get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been perfect if it wasn’t broken
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid and sturdy for the price point. If one of the weights hadn’t been broken off, this would have been darn near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Bair

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law loved this when she got it for Xmas. It seemed quite heavy for the size, which I think is a good thing, so it would not tip over with a heavy cook book on it. very pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my sister for Christmas. Seems like a good sturdy product, however, I have never used it, but she also has never complained about it either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to daughter in law
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but doesn't fit my big recipe book, gave to Daughter in law as it works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cookbook holder perfect for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cookbook holder. It's just the right size and I like the recipe markers.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great addition to the kitchen décor. It does the job. May not support really large, tall cook books. More of a lighter bronze color than depicted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my mother on mother's day she loved it. I was very happy with it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mother on mother's day she loved it. I was very happy with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: tyneal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for propping up my lesson plan book on my desk. Its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schwabedissen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and gets the job done! I am happy with it and would reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: perfect cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: It does just what it's suppose to do - keeps book off counter, chains w/ weights holds pages open, it's even magnetic so you can attach recipe card, stand folds so it doesn't take up much space when not in use. When not in use it is decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Durable and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality book stand. A bit wider stance than I was expecting once you pull the legs out.
customer_reviews.author: Joey A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The stand is much larger that portrayed & really don't care for it, it's pretty
customer_reviews.author: nancy Schorsch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. It holds my cook books and keeps the right page.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiG

customer_reviews.title: Fancy and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is so cute and I love how it holds up my books so I'm not straining my neck all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Baldassari

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Addition to My Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Holds my recipe book open and looks great - even decorative - in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cook book holder
customer_reviews.text: This holder works really good. It is a little bigger than I thought it would be but is probably why it works so good.
customer_reviews.author: abbydog

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger then I thought it'd be. Doesn't fit the biggest cookbooks we have. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully. I used these to hold my daughter's bridal ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. I used these to hold my daughter's bridal portraits at her wedding and then brought them home to use in my kitchen. They're very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - I have one and bought one for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Pena

customer_reviews.title: Love my cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: Love my cookbook stand. Know I won't have messed up pages to try to read through the spots and spills.
customer_reviews.author: Diana George

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! My daughter loved it. Using it as a cook book holder.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Holds are books great. It feels well made and had small weights ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds are books great. It feels well made and had small weights on a chain that hold the top of the pages down. Glade I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cookbook holder
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cookbook holder! It is so cute! Sometimes the bottom of the holder blocks out the bottom part of the cookbook, but who cares! Too cute not to get.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on the counter and holds my book open as ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. It looks great on the counter and holds my book open as designed. However most of my cookbooks are very thick so I'm not sure how this would handle a smaller, thinner cookbook
customer_reviews.author: j buchanan

customer_reviews.title: I love this cook book stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this cook book stand, but I only gave it four stars, because it is really tall. It did not fit under my cup boards. I had to return it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of things online so I've learned to really research each product, read all reviews and descriptions. This stand is exactly as pictured and described. I have recently remodeled my entire kitchen and have opted for a tuscan theme, this stand fits in perfectly. It does not look cheap at all, the little chains hanging that would keep your cookbook open are heavy enough to do the job. I know this may seem like such a small kitchen item to rave about, but I have been very selective in everything I am buying for my new remodel, and this one really looks great!
customer_reviews.author: c-spot-run

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good sized cook book and looks pretty even not in use
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Webster

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The construction is sturdy and it looks very nice BUT the ledge at the front of the shelf is too shallow to hold any of my thicker cookbooks (Joy of Cooking, How to Cook Everything, etc) so it makes it pretty useless unless the cookbook is very thin. Will be donating it and looking for a replacement. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lugena Wahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Looks much nicer in person.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely was pleasantly surprised when I received it. It is a beautiful sturdy piece. It is 13 inch wide so it takes some counter space if you dont have the room but it really accents the room. I will be using it often when Im looking up new recipes. It makes a nice kitchen decor. Highly recommend even great for a bridal gift or housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Matousek

customer_reviews.title: ... as a birthday gift for my mother and it's great. It's heavy duty and easily held her large ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a birthday gift for my mother and it's great. It's heavy duty and easily held her large cookbooks. The weights on the front are heavy enough to hold down the pages. I really like this stand and will most likely be ordering one for myself :0)
customer_reviews.author: rmecdm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy, & holds my thickest cookbook without a problem!
customer_reviews.author: H. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, heavy duty and doesn't take up much counter space. The weighted chains are the perfect touch to hold the pages of your cookbook down. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: WyoMom

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely what I was looking for. It's made ...
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely what I was looking for. It's made very durable and it even has hanging paper weights to keep pages open.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia M. Di San Martín

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to hold a beautiful cookbook that I received as a gift. It is perfect, well built and sturdy and goes well with my kitchen decor. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Defective--crooked stand.
customer_reviews.text: The stand was defective--one of the feet was quite crooked. Sent it back. Would've tried a replacement as the rest was as described except that it was not black as in the picture. Instead it is a cheap brown.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand - it looks beautiful on my counter and holds back even the stiffest of pages. Amazing price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love ours. Why didn't we get one of these years ago?
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBakedAmbs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookbook stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook holder!...I can read my recipes without dropping ingredients on the pages...The stand is wrought iron and very decorative!...It has an old world look...it's solid, but not too heavy...It easily folds down if you need to stash it away...Mine stays out, always!...I would recommend this as a gift to anyone who loves cookbooks...
customer_reviews.author: gabby brunson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds different size books. Very handy and I love wrought iron. Very classy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and folds easily for storage. Fits big cookbooks and small paperback. Best feature is the metal balls that hold the book open.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough to hold a heavy cookbook and will make ...
customer_reviews.text: This book stand is exactly as described. Sturdy enough to hold a heavy cookbook and will make the perfect gift for my friend who loves to cook. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Tripar Swirl Design Metal Cookbook Stand, Tablet, iPad, Catalog, Cookbook Recipe Holder, Portable, Adjustable, Free-Standing
product_meta.description: Size:1-(Pack)This Swirl Accented Cookbook Stand is a perfect functional decor piece for storing and displaying cookbooks, recipes, books and more. The beautifully detailed metal design elegantly accentuates every style home. This piece features a 2" lip depth and 2 small chains with ball accents to weigh down pages of books.
